item.title: Getting Started With Jekyll
item.description: Quick-Start Commands gem install bundler gem install jekyll # need to installed ruby2.3-dev package # If the existing directory isn’t empty, you can pass the --force option with jekyll new . --force. jekyll new my-awesome-site cd my-awesome-site bundle exec jekyll serve # => Now browse to http://localhost:4000 # in project folder bundle info <gem> bundle update <gem> bundle exec jekyll serve # browse to localhost:4000 # another way to system wide upgrade to latest Rubygems, run: gem update --system Install gem dependencies in jekyll project;
